name: ProfitLine
overview: ProfitLine, Inc. provides telecom expense management services for companies in the United States. It offers Telecom Lifecycle Management (TLM) Enterprisea, an outsourced solution for managing the telecom lifecycle process for wireline and wireless, such as managing carrier contracts, handling orders, developing an inventory database, paying invoices, optimizing services, and information reporting. The company also provides MyTelcoManager, a proprietary Web application platform, which supports its TLM solution; and MyDeviceManager mobile device management services. In addition, ProfitLine offers various services, including communications management, telecom asset management, order provisioning, and telecom spend management and cost management services. Further, it offers optional services, such as telecom contract assessment, directed negotiation, historical audit, and consultative services. ProfitLine was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in San Diego, California.

acquisition.source_description: Tangoe, Inc. Announces the Acquisition of ProfitLine, Inc.
